text: $(br)$(#bd951a)Special: $()$(#ff0000)Can use Large Sun to heal health to full.

$(br2)$(#bd951a)"People wonder how I feel about getting constantly chewed on by zombies," says Wall-nut. "What they don't realize is that with my limited senses all I can feel is a kind of tingling, like a relaxing back rub."

pages.title: â›¨ Reinforce Family
pages.text: $(#25228d)Wall-nuts have hard shells which you can use to protect your other plants.
